# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Write me the perfect simple Midjourney app for musicians in a country with 24 regions.
The essence of which will be that there is a planet where you can rotate and on it 24 continents, etc.
You can choose one region and see all the recording studios, events, photo studios and agencies with equipment for music.
The app interface should be light blue with white labels.
Clouds fly around the planet.

Відповідь: Welcome to Midjourney – the perfect app for musicians in a country with 24 regions!

We've designed our app with you in mind, and it will be your one-stop-shop to discover and book a wide range of professional services for your music career.

The interface of the app has a celestial backdrop of a planet against a light blue sky, with 24 colorful continents rotating around it. To start, simply choose the region in which you wish to conduct your music business.

Once you've chosen a region, a menu will appear featuring a wealth of features. For example, you can use our directory of recording studios, events, photo studios and agencies to find what you require. You can even filter the services by price, location and more.

In addition, you'll be able to explore the promotions and discounts offered by our partners, as well as information on upcoming events and music festivals. Plus, each region comes with a discography featuring expertly curated music, with links to download and streaming services.

So why wait? Download Midjourney now and embark on your journey of music discovery.
